data.subject: Executive/Personal Assistant
data.message:
Busy CEO/President of an interior design firm and furniture retailer seeks a Executive/Personal Assistant with experience in handling a wide range of administrative and executive support related tasks. Duties include; prepare and edit correspondence, communications, presentations and other documents. Assist with wholesale and retail sales. Manage newsletters and customer contact mailings and inquires. Conduct other general administrative duties as assigned and assist where needed.

 

 

 

The ideal candidate must be thorough, responsible, organized, hardworking, punctual, flexible and professional in appearance and conduct. The candidate should have the ability to take direction and balance multiple tasks. The ability to interact with staff (at all levels) in a fast paced, sometimes under pressure, environment while maintaining a high level of professionalism. She/he must have outstanding written and verbal communication skills along with a strong knowledge of MS Office. Must have dependable transportation with current insurance & registration. Must be bilingual: English-Spanish.

 

This position will be full-time from 11am-7pm weekdays only.

Please contact jobs@eemiami.net

data.subject: Design Showroom seeks highly motivated, Fully Bilingual (English/ Spanish) Full Time Interior designers and Sales Persons
data.message:
Creative, Fun, Energetic, Interior Design Showroom seeks highly motivated, Fully Bilingual (English/ Spanish) Full Time Interior designers and Sales Persons

Duties will include:

- Greeting & classifying clients.
- Helping clients with their furniture needs for complete design projects
- Following up with clients.
- Learning all the different lines of furniture.
- Tactical negotiation.
Please see below a brief summary of our Company and the services that we provide:

Eclectic Elements is a unique Furniture, Art and Design Gallery located in Coral Gables, Florida. Our firm offers full interior design services with the quickest delivery turnaround even for custom pieces. Eclectic Elements is accustomed to working with High clientele such as celebrities, athletes, Singers, etc. Our expansive showroom features hundreds of styles of furniture that are readily available for next day delivery. Eclectic Elements is a direct importer of furniture, lighting and accessories. We receive shipments with new merchandise daily. In business since 1989 we offer one of the largest in stock collections of contemporary, modern and transitional furniture to fit every lifestyle and budget.
Eclectic Elements offers 24-hour turnkey interiors so you can start enjoying your home immediately. In addition the company offers complementary design services and designer furniture rentals, very useful for production companies, motion picture filming, still photography, or to provide furniture and interior decoration for special events. Realtors and developers are using our luxury furniture rental program to stage apartments or homes on the market for rent or sale. To view some of our furniture collection please log onto www.eemiami.com.
~ Commercial, Residential and Hospitality Design Projects ~
(Hotels, Restaurants, Night Clubs, Offices, Etc. - Factory Direct Container Pricing)
Our company also offers exquisitely furnished and unfurnished waterfront estates for short or long-term rentals. The homes feature breathtaking panoramic water views and world-class interiors designed by Eclectic Elements. These estates are available for sale or lease. Three of our featured properties, which were furnished in 12 hrs and featured in HGTV and BRAVO are available to be seen on our virtual tours:
http://rtvpix.com/rst/RE-0041-IVVXVF-01
http://www.circlepix.com/home2/D6MNT9
Casa Dove Article--Hollywood in Florida
http://www.circlepix.com/home2/D6C4HH
or you can log onto www.widebayestates.com to see our virtual tours.
At Eclectic Elements we pride ourselves in making your place look fabulous while saving you time and money!
We also have other luxury waterfront estates from classic to modern available for short/long term rentals and sales. Some features available are breathtaking views, complete privacy roof top terraces, electric gates and 24 hour security as well as deep-water docks for large yachts. All the estates have access to concierge services for your stay in Miami. Services include but are not limited to yachts, jet-skis, luxury car rentals, jets, helicopters, home spa treatments and more. Situated on the islands, the estates are ideally suited as private retreats.
Send your resume to angie@eemiami.net
Angie Hernandez from 11am to 7pm
